https://world.openproductsfacts.org/terms-of-use
Open Products Facts is an open database of more than %1$s products (plus the ones you will contribute).
Open Products Facts ir atvērta datu bāze ar edienu produktiem un to sastāvdaļām, alergēniem, uztura faktiem un informāciju par produktiem, ko varam atrast produktu marķējmos.
Veicināt pārredzamību pārtikas jomā
Skenējiet produktus, uzņemiet attēlus, veiciet pārredzamību
Iegūstiet faktus
Plaša informācija par skenēto produktu brīvi pieejama jums
Sekojiet līdzi izmantotajam produktam
Visi kosmētikas izmantojat vienu parocīgiem sarakstu var eksportēt
Darbojas bezsaistē
Jūs varat pievienot jaunus produktus, pat ja jums pašlaik nav interneta savienojuma
Skenētais produkts vēl nav pieejams Open Products Facts sarakstā. Lūdzu, pievienojiet to.
Jūsu skenētais produkts jau pastāvOpen Products Facts.
Apskatiet šo produktu, izmantojot Open Products Facts:
Open Products Facts pašlaik neatbalsta grāmatas
- paplašināt meklēšanu \ n- skenēt un pievienot to Open Products Facts
Noklikšķiniet šeit, lai ziedotu Open Products Facts
Palīdziet tulkot \"open Food Facts\"
Iegūstiet Open Products Facts savā valoda- tehniskās zināšanas nav nepieciešamas
Scan the products even when you are offline so as to add them to Open Products Facts later. The scanned products will appear here and you will be able to send them using the button below.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Products Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
Open Products Facts Android App
the free product database
The product %1$s you scanned does not exist yet in Open Products Facts. Can you add it?
Currently on Open Products Facts
Help categorize products
Add more details to help complete the product
Add a category to help complete the product
Add a category and more details to help complete the product
Products I have
Produkti, kurus iegādāties
Add to Open Products Facts

You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"Products to buy\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Open Products Facts logo
Examples: Nike, Apple, etc…
